Gridify

A Modern Dynamic LINQ library for .NET

Get Started Introduction

Simple

Gridify is easy to use and provides a powerful string-based dynamic LINQ query language.

Performant

In comparison to other LINQ libraries, Gridify so far has been able to outperform all other dynamic LINQ even with its extra features.

Compatible

You can use Gridify in any .NET Core or .NET Framework project. In another words it can be used anywhere that LINQ is supported, Specially along with Entity Framework.
